GapFillInput.Title: Present perfect
GapFillInput.Instruction: Put the past participle of the verb in brackets into the gaps. Type your answer in each gap.

Content.Question:
1. Have you ever forgotten (forget) someone’s name?
2. Mark’s taken (take) about 100 photos so far this week.
3. I’ve often bought (buy) DVDs and CDs online.
4. My computer has never had (have) a virus.
5. I’ve phoned (phone) Robin five times today but there’s no answer.
6. We’ve walked (walk) 40 kilometres so far.
7. Oh no, I’ve left (leave) the tickets at home.
8. Chantal hasn’t read (read) The Da Vinci Code.
9. Have you checked (check) your e-mails today?
10. I’ve watched (watch) five films so far this week.
